title: Well Running Hotel Rock House Reception Hall for sale in (Gal Bangalawa) Piliyandala.
details: Brilliant Well Running Banquet hall / Rock House is available for Sale in Piliyandala. This magical looking place is situated next to Bolgoda Lake and surrounded with beautiful and quiet environment. The Banquet hall consists a house which is completely built out of Granite Rocks which gives a Royal and Castle look to the premises. Rock house can accommodate 750 clients internally and externally and has a facility of parking for 100 vehicles.
